text: René Follet (10 April 1931 — 14 March 2020), sometimes known by the pen name Ref, was a Belgian illustrator, comics writer and artist. He worked for the Dutch magazine Eppo, and for the major publishing houses in Belgium and France, including Dupuis, Le Lombard, and Glénat.or as the website Evene puts it: > "le plus 'célèbre méconnu' des grands maîtres du 9e art." Follet died at the age of 88 on March 14, 2020. ==References== ==Other websites== * René Follet biography on Lambiek Comiclopedia * René Follet overview Retrieved 06-11-2008 * Yvan Zourine web site Retrieved 06-11-2008 Category:1931 births Category:2020 deaths Category:People from Brussels Category:Comics artists Category:Illustrators
title: René Follet
